text: The same man went to see Carlyle and, after mentioning that he had dined with Longfellow told the sage a very funny story which made Carlyle absolutely laugh; but all the Chelsea philosopher did in return was to ask if his guest would have a cup of tea!
handwritten_text: The same man went to see Carlyle and, after mentioning that he had dined with Longfellow told the sage a very funny story which made Carlyle absolutely laugh; but all the Chelsea philosopher did in return was to ask if his guest would have a cup of tea!
